title: Xiaomi showcases SU7 electric sedan in India, no word on launch date
description: Celebrating its 10th anniversary, Xiaomi unveiled the SU7 electric car and launched Redmi 13 5G and Redmi Buds 5C. Priced under USD 30,000 and produced with BAIC Group in a 200,000-vehicle capacity Beijing factory, SU7 features a "super electric motor" and up to 800 km range. Initially delivered in China, it reflects Xiaomiâ€™s diversification strategy.
